description:
Whether you snapped your chain, or just wore your last one out, this SLX 12 speed chain will have you hammering up fire roads and ripping berms in no time.

  • Sil-Tec ultra-low-friction surface treatment
  • Smooth power transfer and shifting under high-load pedaling
  • Quick-link makes it easy to take your chain on and off
name: Shimano SLX CN-M7100 12 Speed Chain
